title: The Rural Payments Agency Podcast: Episode 23

content.text: Welcome to the thirteenth episode of The RPA Podcast. In our latest episode, we discuss the videos produced by RPA to provide farmers with helpful information about what to expect from Field Officer visits, as well as better understand schemes, grants and regulations.

The first section of the podcast covers RPA’s launch of the first in a new series of videos, under the title ‘What to expect from an RPA farm visit', earlier this year. The series is part of RPA's broader strategy to support farmers in meeting their regulatory obligations. The first video was designed to provide farmers with essential information about sheep and goat identification visits and how to effectively prepare for them.
The second section of the podcast covers what farmers can expect from a regulatory cattle visit, with the second video in the series due out shortly.

The final section of the podcast explores other videos available on RPA’s YouTube channel containing valuable information and advice for farmers including: What to expect from an SFI 23 Guidance visit, Integrated Pest Management and Management of Hedgerows Regulations (2024).
You can listen to episode 13, and earlier episodes of The RPA Podcast on Apple, Spotify or Buzzsprout.
